Add support v2 table path (ex: DescribeRelation v2 table [path)|https://github.com/apache/spark/blob/3d292dc7b1c5b5ff977c178a88f8ee73deaee88f/sql/core/src/main/scala/org/apache/spark/sql/execution/datasources/v2/DataSourceV2Strategy.scala#L385]
